text: $(#bd951a)Damage Radius: $()$(#ff0000)2.5 Blocks, center is 1.5 blocks in front.

$(br)$(#bd951a)Used to be hammer rivals with Hammer Flower, but then one day, "I reject my hammer, FlowFlow!" Since then, he became Meteor Hammer.
